strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Welcome to Friday! Here's some fun things happening this weekend:

  • Neon: Crystal Bridges is hosting a fun night of creativity and glowing art tonight.
  • Singin': Live music doesn't stop around here, no matter the weather.
  • Red and White: The Razorbacks Men's Basketball team has a scrimmage on Sunday at Barnhill.
  • Listen: Kick back in Turnbow Park for Brews & Tunes tomorrow.
  • Warm up: Gather 'round a bonfire and roast some marshmallows at Shiloh Square.
  • Arts & crafts: It's craft fair season, and there are plenty to choose from.
  • More books: The Bentonville Public Library is having its last pop up book sale of the year tomorrow.
  • Bike: Square 2 Square was rescheduled to THIS Saturday.

Bye until Monday!
